entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 4.

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Fog patches developing this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
